title: Dear Mr. Heavenly Fox
overview: The drama mainly tells the love story between Miss Qi Yuanbao from the prestigious family of cultivators and the fox fairy Chang Yue. Fate brings them together at Suiyue Mountain, where the human and the fox meet. Just as Chang Yue is about to obtain the Heart Soul Fruit, the fruit flies directly into Yuanbao's body. This incident binds them together, unraveling a love and oath that has been buried for thousands of yearsâ€¦
